markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Djezet Dose](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1412)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Some mages carry vials of [djezet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1410) for its magic-enhancing properties. When you drink a djezet dose, if your next action is to Cast a Spell, you can apply the effects of the [Reach Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=181) or [Widen Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=315) metamagic feats.

**Craft Requirements** At least 300 gp of djezet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Djezet Dose
